tr_infoPlanMidweekMeeting: ဃုထၢ နွံတနွံ ဒ်သိး နကစးထီၣ် ပာ်အါထီၣ် မူဒါတဖၣ် ဒီး မၤဂ့ၤထီၣ် တၢ်ရဲၣ်တၢ်ကျဲၤ မ့ၢ်လိၣ်န့ၣ်. နသူ ပျဲခီၣ်ဖၠူထၢၣ်မၤလၢပှဲၤ စ့ၢ်ကီးသ့, ဒီး Organized ကမၤၦဲၤတၢ် မူဒါတဖၣ် ဒ် ပှၤသူတၢ်ဖိ အတၢ်အိၣ်သး အိၣ်ဝဲအသိးန့ၣ်လီၤ.
tr_infoSecondPlanMidweekMeeting: ဃုထၢ နွံတနွံ ဒ်သိး နကရဲၣ်ကျဲၤအီၤ လၢနနီၢ်ကစၢ်, မ့တမ့ၢ် ပျဲ Organized လၢကဟ့ၣ် မူဒါတဖၣ် လၢအနီၢ်ကစၢ် ဒီး ပျဲခီၣ်ဖၠူထၢၣ်မၤလၢပှဲၤ, ခီဖျိ ကွၢ် ပှၤမၤမူဒါဖိ အတၢ်အိၣ်သး ဒီး မူဒါလၢအပူၤကွံာ်တဖၣ်. နဆီတလဲကဒါက့ၤအီၤ သ့လီၤ.
tr_weekType: နွံ အကလုာ်
tr_clearAll: မၤကဆှီ ခဲလၢာ်
tr_saveEditedProgramParts: ပၥ်ဃၥ် တၢ်ရဲၣ်တၢ်ကျဲၤ အတၢ်ဆီတလဲတဖၣ်
tr_duration: တၢ်အယံၥ်အထၢ
tr_overwriteWithCustomData: ဆီတလဲအီၤ လၢနတၢ်ဂ့ၢ်တၢ်ကျိၤ
tr_lastAssignment: မူဒါ လၢခံကတၢၢ်
tr_participants: ၦၤလၢအနုၥ်လီၤမၤသကိးတၢ်
tr_assignmentsHistory: မူဒါ အဂ့ၢ်အကျိၤ
tr_exportMidweekMeetinDesc: ဃုထၢ တၢ်ရဲၣ်လီၤကျဲၤလီၤ ဒီး လံၥ်တဘ့ၣ် လၢနအဲၣ်ဒိး ဆှၢထီၣ် ဒီး ဃုထၢ တၢ်အဒိ (Template). နတၢ်ဃုထၢန့ၣ် တၢ်ကတိၢ်နီၣ် အီၤ လၢခါဆူညါအဂီၢ်.
tr_clearSelectedWeeks: မၤကဆှီ နွံလၢ နဃုထၢ
tr_unsavedChanges: တၢ်ဆီတလဲတဖၣ် တပၥ်ဃၥ်ဘၣ်
tr_unsavedChangesDesc: နအဲၣ်ဒိး ဟးထီၣ်လၢ လံာ်ကဘျံးပၤအံၤ လၢတပၥ်ကီၤ တၢ်ဆီတလဲတဖၣ်ဘၣ်ဧါ? တၢ်ဆီတလဲလၢ နတပၥ်ကီၤဘၣ်န့ၣ် ကဟးဂီၤ.
tr_startWeek: နွံအစးထီၣ်
tr_openingSong: တၢ်သးဝံ အခီၣ်ထံး
tr_closingSong: တၢ်သးဝံ လၢခံကတၢၢ်
tr_clearAllAssignments: မၤကဆှီ မူဒါ ခဲလၢာ်
tr_selectSong: ဃုထၢ တၢ်သးဝံ
tr_skip: လဲၤကပၥ်ကွံၥ်
tr_autofillCompletedDesc: နွံကတၢၢ် မူဒါတဖၣ် ပာ်အါထီၣ်လၢ နွံလၢနဃုထၢအပူၤလံ
tr_newWeekAddedDesc: You can find it in the meeting weeks list
tr_publishSchedulesDesc: Select the schedules you want to publish for everybody in congregation to view them. Past schedules are accessible to everyone for 3 months after their expiration date.
tr_successfullyPublishedDesc: Now everybody in your congregation can view the schedule and prepare for the assignments
tr_infoOutgoingTalk: Brothers that will visit other congregations with a public talk
tr_successfullyImportedDesc: New materials now available on related scheduling pages
tr_EPUBImportFailedDesc: Make sure that your app language matches the language of the .epub file and try again.
tr_meetingMaterialsNotAvailable: The meeting materials for this week have not been imported to Organized yet. If they are already accessible, import them from jw.org or an .epub file.
tr_customMeetingPartDesc: Your custom meeting part. If no info is entered, it won't be displayed in the schedule.
tr_clearAllAssignmentsDesc: Are you sure you want to clear all created assignments for this meeting? You can always reassign them later.
tr_visitinSpeakerHelpText: You can add speakers manually, but we recommend adding them in advance on the Speakers catalog page
tr_speakersCatalogLocalDesc: Based on your selection, you see visiting speakers from other congregations. To assign another speaker not from the catalog, simply close this window and select him in the 'Speaker' field.
tr_speakersCatalogVisitingDesc: Based on your selection, you see the outgoing speakers of your congregatiog. To assign another local brother not from the catalog, simply close this window and select him in the speaker field.
tr_outgoingTalkSynced: This outgoing talk has been synced with the {{ congregation }} congregation schedule. Please contact their public talk coordinator for any corrections or updates.
tr_clearOutgoingTalkDesc: Are you sure you want to clear all assignments and congregation details for this outgoing talk? You can always fill out them later.
tr_outgoingTalkDeleteDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this outgoing talk schedule?
tr_linkedPartsDesc: Select a meeting part to automatically link opening and/or closing prayers to the same brother
tr_partNotIncludedForThisWeek: This part isn’t included for this week
tr_auxClassroomAssignServiceGroup: Assign field service group for auxiliary classroom
tr_auxClassroomAssignServiceGroupDesc: Allow selecting a specific field service group for student parts when scheduling each meeting. You can always select other students manually.
